BasicInfo.short: AdsWizz is a leading global technology provider of advertising solutions for the digital radio and audio industries.

Products.name: AudioMatic (DSP)
Products.description: AudioMatic is a Media Buying Platform allowing agencies and trading desks to implement, optimize and measure digital audi buys.

Products.name: AudioMax (SSP)
Products.description: AudioMax is an audio-centric supply side platform enabling publishers to easily connect, manage and optimize their chosen demand sources.

Products.name: Audio Ad Insertion Suite (AIS)
Products.description: AIS is a dynamic server & client side ad insertion software solution enabling audio publishers to generate revenue from their content.

Products.name: AudioMetrix (Analytics)
Products.description: AudioMetrix is a SAAS based audience analytics & supply intelligence platform for digital audio publishers.

Products.name: AdWave (Ad Exchange)
Products.description: AdWave is a global audio ad Marketplace enabling advertisers and publishers to transact buying and selling of digital audio advertising.

news.title: Sociomantic Launches Singapore Office, Hires Another Googler To Run Operations

Products.name: AudioServe (Ad Server)
Products.description: AudioServe enables publishers to manage targeted and trackable audio advertising campaigns on any device and application.
